## Quality Checklist

<!-- Verify code quality standards -->

- [ ] Code follows project style guidelines
- [ ] Pre-commit hooks pass locally
- [ ] No new linting errors/warnings

- [ ] Error handling is appropriate
- [ ] No hardcoded values (configuration externalized)
- [ ] Code is DRY (no unnecessary duplication)

## Security & Performance

<!-- Address security and performance implications -->

### Security

- [ ] Security implications reviewed
- [ ] No sensitive data exposed (credentials, keys, tokens)
- [ ] Input validation added where necessary
- [ ] No SQL injection, XSS, or other OWASP Top 10 vulnerabilities
- [ ] Dependencies reviewed for known vulnerabilities

### Performance

- [ ] Performance impact assessed
- [ ] No performance regressions (if applicable)
- [ ] Benchmark results provided (for performance-critical changes)
- [ ] Memory usage considered and optimized
- [ ] Algorithm complexity is appropriate (Big-O analyzed)
